search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Pipefy (pipefy.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Pipefy is: [https://www.pipefy.com/pricing/](https://www.pipefy.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

Special plan for Small Businesses
---------------------------------

Achieve more with less by automating processes across the entire company. Hassle-free. No-code.

Up to 90% discount for SMB packages

Access to all features

Integration with over 500 other tools

Personalized knowledge base

Expert support

Platform training for your team

Exclusive fixed-price offer!

This offer is valid for companies with 11 to 200 employees, subject to certain conditions.

Learn more

Globally trusted by some of the most prestigious enterprises

### Questions & Answers

If you need help, we are ready to provide guidance and support.

### Do I need any advanced technical skills or professional support services to implement Pipefy?

Pipefy is designed to be simple and easy, allowing anyone to configure their own processes and workflows. However, in large and complex operations some companies like to have the support of our professional consultants – in this case we can recommend companies that offer those services.

### Will my data be private and safe?

Keeping your data secure is a top priority at Pipefy. Review our security protocols and how your business and customer data will be protected in our security whitepaper.

### What if I need to add someone new to my team?

If you need to add new members, you can do that. The amount charged per new user will be the same for the other members included in your plan.

[See our article for more information](https://help.pipefy.com/en/articles/619504-pipefy-pricing-policies).

### Can I change plans anytime I want? How long are the contracts?

The contracts can be monthly or yearly. You can start/stop or make changes to your plan any time you want – however, we won’t give refunds for cancellation or plan downgrades.

[See our article for more information](https://help.pipefy.com/en/articles/614618-how-to-cancel-a-pipefy-subscription).

### Does Pipefy integrate with other systems?

Yes. There are 5 ways to integrate Pipefy with your favorite tools: Custom Integrations with any software you need. [Request a quote here](https://app.pipefy.com/public/form/WIb8ff63). Native integrations with Slack, GitHub, BitBucket, and Google Hangouts. Via API. Via [HTTP requests](https://help.pipefy.com/en/articles/8392669-how-to-create-integrations-with-http-requests-and-further-customize-your-processes-using-automations). Via Zapier.

Pipefy offers simple pricing for more efficient workflows. Get started today.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pipefy offers a free tier and subscription-based pricing with additional features for higher tiers. Enterprise plans are quote-based.

features: Expert support for modeling and implementing customized processes

promotional_offers.offer_description: Up to 90% discount for SMB packages with access to all features.
